tasks.label: build
args: mkdir -p ./build/Debug && echo 'Directory created or already exists' && g++ -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wshadow -Wformat=2 -Wcast-align -Wconversion -Wsign-conversion -Wnull-dereference -g3 -O0 -c ${file} -o ./build/Debug/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.o && echo 'Build completed successfully'

tasks.label: link
args: echo 'Linking object file...'; g++ ./build/Debug/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.o -o ./build/Debug/outDebug && echo 'Linking completed successfully.'
tasks.detail: Link object file to create executable
